metadata.name: Finance Type
metadata.description: DAC/CRS transaction classification used to distinguish financial instruments,  e.g. grants or loans.

110.name: Subvenção comum
110.description: Grants are transfers in cash or in kind for which no legal debt is incurred by the recipient.

210.name: Bonificação de juros
210.description: A payment to soften the terms of private export credits, or loans or credits by the banking sector.

211.name: Bonificação de juros para exportadores privados nacionais

310.name: Subscrição de capital com base nos depósitos
310.description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally encashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

311.name: Subscrição de capital com base nas entradas em caixa
311.description: Payments to multilateral agencies in the form of notes and similar instruments, unconditionally encashable at sight by the recipient institutions.

410.name: Empréstimo de ajuda excluindo reorganização de dívida

411.name: Empréstimo relacionado com investimento a países em desenvolvimento

412.name: Empréstimo em empreendimento conjunto com o destinatário

421.name: Empréstimo normal
421.description: Transfers in cash or in kind for which the recipient incurs legal debt (and the resulting claim is not intended to be traded).  Since payment obligations on standard loan are senior obligations, i.e. creditors are entitled to receive payments against their claims before anyone else, they are also referred to as senior loans.

422.name: Subvenção reembolsável
422.description: A contribution provided to a recipient institution for investment purposes, with the expectation of long-term reflows at conditions specified in the financing agreement. The provider assumes the risk of total or partial failure of the investment; it can also decide if and when to reclaim its investment.

423.name: Obrigações
423.description: Fixed-interest debt instruments, issued by governments, public utilities, banks or companies, tradable in financial markets.

424.name: Títulos garantidos por ativos
424.description: Securities whose value and income payments are derived from and backed by a specific pool of underlying assets.

431.name: Empréstimo subordinado
431.description: A loan that, in the event of default, will only be repaid after all senior obligations have been satisfied.  In compensation for the increased risk, mezzanine debt holders require a higher return for their investment than secured or more senior lenders.

432.name: Capital preferencial
432.description: Equity that, in the event of default, will be repaid after all senior obligations and subordinated loans have been satisfied; and will be paid before common equity holders. It is a more expensive source of finance than senior debt, a less expensive source than equity.

451.name: Créditos à exportação com garantias não bancárias

452.name: Parcelas não garantidas de créditos à exportação com garantias não bancárias

510.name: Capital ordinário
510.description: A share in the ownership of a corporation that gives the owner claims on the residual value of the corporation after creditors’ claims have been met.

511.name: Aquisição de participações que não como parte de empreendimentos conjuntos em países em desenvolvimento

520.name: Participações em veículos de investimento coletivo
520.description: Collective undertakings through which investors pool funds for investment in financial or nonfinancial assets or both. These vehicles issue shares (if a corporate structure is used) or units (if a trust structure is used).

530.name: Ganhos reinvestidos
530.description: This item is only applicable to Foreign Direct Investment (FDI). Reinvested earnings on FDI consist of the retained earnings of a direct foreign investment enterprise which are treated as if they were distributed and remitted to foreign direct investors in proportion to their ownership of the equity of the enterprise and then reinvested by them in the enterprise.

613.name: Perdão de dívida: pedidos de OFP (J)

621.name: Reescalonamento de dívida: pedidos de APD (J)

631.name: Reescalonamento de dívida: pedido de OFP (RSD – juros originais do empréstimo)

632.name: Reescalonamento de dívida: pedido privado (RSD – capital original do empréstimo)

633.name: Perdão/conversão de dívida: pedidos de créditos à exportação (C)

634.name: Perdão/conversão de dívida: pedidos de créditos à exportação (J)

635.name: Perdão de dívida: pedidos de créditos à exportação (RSD)

636.name: Reescalonamento de dívida: pedidos de créditos à exportação (C)

637.name: Reescalonamento de dívida: pedidos de créditos à exportação (J)

639.name: Reescalonamento de dívida: pedido de crédito à exportação (RSD – capital original do empréstimo)

710.name: Investimento direto estrangeiro, novo fluxo de saída de capital (inclui ganhos reinvestidos se não estiver disponível identificação separada)

711.name: Outro investimento estrangeiro direto, incluindo ganhos reinvestidos

913.name: Títulos e outros instrumentos originalmente emitidos por entidades multilaterais
